hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Services - Best Use of an Amazon Service

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
The Project must be complete, by which we mean function! If the code does not work you will be assigned 1 Point.

If the Code works perfectly fine, you will be awarded with 10 Points.

Feel free to twist and combine the cases, or make something completely different.

Questions you should ask yourself: Did anybody before identify this problem? Was this problem already solved like this?
Can your Software be used intuitively? Are there practical applications.
Show the Judge why your project is exceptional!
